title: What exactly is the point of this?

replies.body: you play less games = less people have to play with you.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4sW27rZH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-30T14:09:15.694+0000)
>
> you play less games = less people have to play with you.

Making me wait 10 minutes isn't punishing me, it's an annoyance which makes me border before the match even starts = more likely to quit because the game is boring me.
that looks like 40minutes to me

> [{quoted}](name=Officer Caitlyn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4sW27rZH,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-30T15:34:26.673+0000)
>
> that looks like 40minutes to me

Ticks down to 30, Riots system is terrible. But really, I'm not toxic.
http://i.gyazo.com/145f12789d179ed686baa08ae91ecc5f.png
got 3 honours 1 game. confirmed not toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=Officer Caitlyn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4sW27rZH,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-30T20:46:20.100+0000)
>
> got 3 honours 1 game. confirmed not toxic.

Stepping on all my accomplishments, please stop.
I was hoping for 4 honours but some %%%% ain't give it even though I carried his bum.

no....not toxic at all.

also, the point of the low priority queue is to show you that you are afking alot and could get banned if you keep it up. also less games for you to AFK in.
its to help reform people before they need to be banned for long periods of time.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4sW27rZH,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-31T07:07:39.175+0000)
>
> no....not toxic at all.
> 
> also, the point of the low priority queue is to show you that you are afking alot and could get banned if you keep it up. also less games for you to AFK in.
> its to help reform people before they need to be banned for long periods of time.

How is everyone so silly, making me wait 10 minutes isn't teaching me not to leave games, its not teaching me to not afk it's only a nuisance, and a minor one at that.

if you get sick of waiting....you dont play. you wont accept the actual queue. if you wait the whole time to get into the normal queue and then accept that....you will more than likely feel obliged to play out the game, because you waited all that time for what? to troll? to afk anyway? well then, afking in low priority queue results in faster punishments. so you get banned and cant play for days at a time.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4sW27rZH,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-30T16:06:16.206+0000)
>
> But really, I'm not toxic.

Good one.

> [{quoted}](name=RLG Shaky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4sW27rZH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-30T17:22:34.960+0000)
>
> you obviously left many of times for this to happen. you got served some justice, and if not then you might want to send s support ticket stating what happened and to stop the leave buster.

I have left games, but only when I get a 4 man pre-made who troll me for not being part of their inner circle. I'm not sticking around while they abuse me and my one report wont be anything because we all know it takes 2 or more for the automatic system to do anything.

if you even used tribunal in NA you would see 1 report per game for multiple games can cause people to get long long bans....so please. just play games instead of afk trolling and just report the people who are bad. rather than cost yourself a ban or low priority queue and then you complaining about it like a little %%%%%.
hahaha fail

You have been a bad boy, haven't you?

[Leave Buster Will Punish You](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=upEOW3xAwCw)!!
